about.projectDescription: SLS Residences The Palm elevates modern luxury, offering a living experience that surpasses the ordinary. Located on Palm Jumeirah's West Crescent, this development blends breathtaking views with SLS's signature playful ambiance and a touch of mischievous charm. Each apartment and penthouse is crafted to delight the senses, with spacious layouts, elegant interiors, and top-of-the-line amenities.

amenities.text: SLS Residences presents an exquisite selection of top-tier amenities, from a lavish clubhouse and exclusive beach club to a state-of-the-art gym, infinity pool, and refined social spaces. Its prime location offers effortless access to elite entertainment venues, sports facilities, and tranquil beach promenades. With breathtaking views of the Atlantis, Burj Al Arab, and Marina, SLS redefines luxury living, surpassing every expectation for the most discerning residents.

items.title: Infinity pool
items.text: The azure waters seem to stretch endlessly, merging seemlesly with the horizon.

items.title: Landscaped Area
items.text: Lush carpets of emerald grass invite barefoot exploration, ideal for picnics and family gatherings.

items.title: Fitness Centre
items.text: It’s a valuable resource for those seeking to maintain an active and healthy lifestyle.

items.title: Kids’ playground
items.text: A vibrant and engaging space designed to inspire joy and creativity.

items.title: Covered parking
items.text: This convenient feature provides peace of mind and easy access.

items.title: Retail shops
items.text: It’s a practical addition, offering easy access to essential goods and trendy items.

descriptions.text: Our installment schemas are devoid of any latent charges or unanticipated costs.
A 4% DLD (Dubai Land Department) fee applies to all real estate transactions in Dubai and must be paid in addition to the property's purchase price.

Roya Lifestyle Development places a premium on quality craftsmanship, ensuring that every detail is meticulously executed. From the foundation to the finishing touches their projects reflect a dedication to excellence.
